dict.acceptation: 缝，做针线活；缝纫；装钉（书籍）；

sent.orig: The imported SEW reductor can be used in closed circuit.
sent.trans: 采用进口的SEW减速机作闭环系统。

sent.orig: Used sew packages, sports articles, sofa and many other materials. Can sew in the opposite diretion.
sent.trans: 适用于包装、运动用品、沙发家具、等各种物料的车缝。

sent.orig: Just Sew Buttonhole Husband: Did you sew the button on my shirt, darling?
sent.trans: 丈夫：你给我把扣子缝好了吗，亲爱的？

sent.orig: Sew the Buttonhole Husband: Did you sew the button on my shirt, darling?
sent.trans: 丈夫：你给我把扣子缝好了吗，关系密切的？

sent.orig: Luckily, I had taught Anthony to sew when he was 13, when he still respected me.
sent.trans: 所幸在安东尼13岁时我已经教过他缝纫，那时他还在崇拜我。
